ApexPage.description:
External User Reviews, Updates, and Submits Changes
If the recipient indicates no changes, they should be shown a web page with a thank you message. If however they have indicated that changes are needed, they should be shown a web page that: - Advises changes will be notified to the internal userâ€™s email - Displays a list of fields with values - Allows them to enter a message to the internal user - Allows them to submit the changes - Shows them the thank you message
ApexPage.label: MSIT_RespondAndSubmit
